languages.text: {n}Кибелла задумывается. В глазах ее вспыхивает огонек любопытства.{/n} "Я бы не отказалась узнать твой мир лучше. Взглянуть на ваши ритуалы, Домин'{name}. Вместе с тобой".

traits.locale_text: "Хм". {n}Кибелла задумывается. В глубине глаз культистки вспыхивает странный огонек — любопытство.{/n} "Возможно... да, я бы не отказалась взглянуть на ваши ритуалы, Эним'{name}. Вместе с тобой". {n}Она отводит глаза при последней фразе.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah thinks for a moment before a spark of curiosity flashes in her eyes.{/n} "I would not be against learning more about your world, seeing your rituals, Domin'{name}... should you be open to showing them to me."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла задумывается. В глазах ее вспыхивает огонек любопытства.{/n} "Я бы не отказалась узнать твой мир лучше. Взглянуть на ваши ритуалы, Домин'{name}. Вместе с тобой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah thinks for a moment. A spark of curiosity flashes in her eyes.{/n} "I would not be against learning more about your world. Seeing your rituals, Enim'{name}. If you would show them to me." {n}She looks away as she says the last words.{/n}

{n}Kibellah thinks for a moment. A spark of curiosity flashes in her eyes.{/n} "I would not be against learning more about your world. Seeing your rituals, Enim'{name}. If you would show them to me." {n}She looks away as she says the last words.{/n}

{n}Kibellah thinks for a moment before a spark of curiosity flashes in her eyes.{/n} "I would not be against learning more about your world, seeing your rituals, Domin'{name}... should you be open to showing them to me."

{n}Kibellah thinks for a moment, before a spark of curiosity flashes in her eyes.{/n} "I would not be against learning more about your world, seeing your rituals, Enim'{name}... should you be open to showing them to me." {n}She looks away as she speaks the last words.{/n}

{n}Kibellah thinks for a moment before a spark of curiosity flashes in her eyes.{/n} "I would not be against learning more about your world, seeing your rituals, Domin'{name}... should you be open to showing them to me."

{n}Kibellah thinks for a moment before a spark of curiosity flashes in her eyes.{/n} "I would not be against learning more about your world, seeing your rituals, Domin'{name}... should you be open to showing them to me."

{n}Kibellah thinks for a moment before a spark of curiosity flashes in her eyes.{/n} "I would not be against learning more about your world, seeing your rituals, Domin'{name}... should you be open to showing them to me."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah reflexiona durante un instante, hasta que una chispa de curiosidad centellea en su mirada.{/n} «No me opondría a averiguar más cosas sobre su mundo y ver sus rituales, Domin'{name}... si estuviera {mf|dispuesto|dispuesta} a mostrármelos».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah thinks for a moment before a spark of curiosity flashes in her eyes.{/n} "I would not be against learning more about your world, seeing your rituals, Domin'{name}... should you be open to showing them to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah reflexiona durante un instante, hasta que una chispa de curiosidad centellea en su mirada.{/n} «No me opondría a averiguar más cosas sobre su mundo y ver sus rituales, Domin'{name}... si estuviera {mf|dispuesto|dispuesta} a mostrármelos».

languages.text: {n}キベラはしばし考え、その目に好奇心の輝きを宿す。{/n}「ドミン・{name}、私はあなたたちの儀式を見て、あなたの世界についてもっと学ぶことに抵抗はない…あなたが私に見せてもいいと思うのならね」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah thinks for a moment before a spark of curiosity flashes in her eyes.{/n} "I would not be against learning more about your world, seeing your rituals, Domin'{name}... should you be open to showing them to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラはしばし考え、その目に好奇心の輝きを宿す。{/n}「ドミン・{name}、私はあなたたちの儀式を見て、あなたの世界についてもっと学ぶことに抵抗はない…あなたが私に見せてもいいと思うのならね」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈思索片刻，目光中闪过一丝好奇的火花。{/n}“如果你愿意让我进一步了解你所在的世界，观察你们的仪式，我是不会反对的，秘者{name}……假如你愿意的话。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah thinks for a moment before a spark of curiosity flashes in her eyes.{/n} "I would not be against learning more about your world, seeing your rituals, Domin'{name}... should you be open to showing them to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈思索片刻，目光中闪过一丝好奇的火花。{/n}“如果你愿意让我进一步了解你所在的世界，观察你们的仪式，我是不会反对的，秘者{name}……假如你愿意的话。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah denkt einen Augenblick nach, bevor ein Funke der Neugier in ihren Augen aufblitzt.{/n} "Ich habe nichts dagegen, mehr über Eure Welt zu erfahren, Eure Rituale zu sehen, Domin'{name} ... solltet Ihr die Offenheit besitzen, sie mir zu zeigen.
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah thinks for a moment before a spark of curiosity flashes in her eyes.{/n} "I would not be against learning more about your world, seeing your rituals, Domin'{name}... should you be open to showing them to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah denkt einen Augenblick nach, bevor ein Funke der Neugier in ihren Augen aufblitzt.{/n} "Ich habe nichts dagegen, mehr über Eure Welt zu erfahren, Eure Rituale zu sehen, Domin'{name} ... solltet Ihr die Offenheit besitzen, sie mir zu zeigen.

languages.text: {n}Kibellah réfléchit quelques instants, puis une étincelle de curiosité illumine son regard.{/n} « J'aurais grand plaisir à en apprendre davantage sur votre monde et ses rituels, Domin'{name}... si toutefois vous êtes {mf|disposé|disposée} à me les montrer. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah thinks for a moment before a spark of curiosity flashes in her eyes.{/n} "I would not be against learning more about your world, seeing your rituals, Domin'{name}... should you be open to showing them to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah réfléchit quelques instants, puis une étincelle de curiosité illumine son regard.{/n} « J'aurais grand plaisir à en apprendre davantage sur votre monde et ses rituels, Domin'{name}... si toutefois vous êtes {mf|disposé|disposée} à me les montrer. »

languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah thinks for a moment before a spark of curiosity flashes in her eyes.{/n} "I would not be against learning more about your world, seeing your rituals, Domin'... should you be open to showing them to me."

languages.text: {n}Bir an düşünen Kibellah'nın gözlerinde merak dolu bir ışıltı beliriyor.{/n} "Dünyanı daha yakından tanıyıp ayinlerini görmeye hayır demem Domin'{name}... Olur da bana göstermek istersen."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah thinks for a moment before a spark of curiosity flashes in her eyes.{/n} "I would not be against learning more about your world, seeing your rituals, Domin'{name}... should you be open to showing them to me."
